page.title: 13LITTLE BARFORD POWER STATION
page.content: Qu.Did you ever exerience any problems with cables falling down? An.Yes because they caught fire. Qu.Did you have to keep the water you used clean ? Why? An.No we used river and when it was cooled off it was returned back to the river. Qu.How much electricity did the power station produce every day? An.A full load of 6,000 kilowatts. Qu.Were there any fish in the ponds? What types of fish were they? An.Yes there were fish in the ponds and they were Trout. Qu.Was the power station there during the Second World War? An.Yes,it was. Qu.Was it ever bombed? An.Yes it was bombed and machine gunned.
